entry.title: Brock Pierce?
entry.summary: The message posted by Peter Todd on bitcoin-dev mailing list on 17th August 2018, was not PGP signed and came from a different server than usual. He suspects that the SPF filtering on the list mail server wasn't working. The message contains a PGP signed message which is not pasted here for privacy reasons. Peter Todd can be contacted at 'peter'[:-1]@petertodd.org.
